Question: Sclanet Inc CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Sclanet Inc

Product 1

- AI-powered computer vision checkout kiosk
- AI-powered multi-tasking Storo robot
- Award-winning products showcased at CES and NRF 2024
- Technology includes AI, computer vision, and robotics
- Designed for retail industry transformation and reshaping commerce operations
- Solutions include mobile cashier-less checkouts, computer vision-based checkout and payment systems, retail robots for multitasking, order fulfillment, and inventory management, and an AI-powered consumer super app
- Booth #60839 at CES, showcasing AI-powered Multi-tasking Robot and Marketplace Super App
- Suite of AI-powered and robotic solutions for retail industry
- Contact info: info@sclanet.com, ph. (650) 784-5795
Summary_cn:
Sclanet Inc

产品1

- 使用人工智能驱动的计算机视觉结算亭
- 使用人工智能驱动的多任务Storo机器人
- 在2024年的CES和NRF展示的屡获大奖的产品
- 技术包括人工智能、计算机视觉和机器人技术
- 旨在改变零售行业并重塑商业运营的设计
- 解决方案包括无人收银台、基于计算机视觉的结算和支付系统、多任务的零售机器人、订单履行和库存管理，以及人工智能驱动的消费者超级应用程序
- 在CES展会的展位号为60839，展示人工智能驱动的多任务机器人和市场超级应用程序
- 针对零售行业的一套人工智能和机器人解决方案
- 联系方式：info@sclanet.com，电话：(650) 784-5795
